original_title: Michael Hartnett - A Necklace of Wrens
overview: Filmed the year before his death, Necklace of Wrens is a documentary profile on the life of one of Irelandâ€™s leading poets, Michael Hartnett. The documentary includes contributions from poets Seamus Heaney, Paul Durcan and Liam O Muirthile, artist Graham Knuttle and musician Sean Tyrell.
title: Michael Hartnett - A Necklace of Wrens
